ground_truth: In an office, a handsome, well-groomed man checks his cell phone and answers. On a cell phone, in the food court, a plump redhead smiles and pumps her fist. Now, in a cluttered house, she wipes her hair dry and punches numbers into a keypad. Along a mirror, fake IDs with the redhead's photo hang from a string. A machine spits out a credit card with Sandy's name on it. The redhead adds it to a stack of fake cards and walks off with a determined expression. Now, at a hip bar, she enters wide-eyed and approaches the bartender. She eyes two men doing shots. She hands him Sandy's credit card. She downs a shot with the guys. Now, the redhead chugs a bottle of green liqueur. She finishes it off and raises her arms. The bartender adds drinks to her tab, totaling over $2,000. Standing on a table, she throws a bottle. She leaps for the chandelier and lands flat on the floor. The bar patrons watch her lie motionless. As a few of them reach down and poke her, she springs up. The frustrated bartender makes his way over as she high-fives patrons. She punches him in the throat. He collapses. Now, a police car pulls up to the bar. Later, two officers escort her out. She breathes into a tube and spews green vomit on the officer. As he shakes it off, she turns to the other officer. At the police station, the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart. Now, the real Sandy sits in front of a birthday cake, surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters. She gives him a paper tie. He picks her up. He puts her face in the cake. She straddles Sandy's lap and looks him in the eyes. He pulls her close and kisses her tenderly. She raises her brow. He carries her out of the room. Daytime. Sandy slowly drives down a congested highway. Later, carrying a briefcase, the well-groomed businessman walks through an enclosed courtyard and enters an office building. Now, Sandy steps off an elevator and walks to his office. A co-worker wearing a suit approaches. Sandy puts down a file and follows Cornish's assistant. He peeks into an office, where Cornish beckons him to enter. Cornish gestures to an earphone. He keeps Sandy from sitting. Cornish shuts the door. Now, Sandy inputs a code into a keypad and enters the records room. He makes his way to a computer station behind a cage wall. He holds up a small packet that lists the partners with substantial bonuses by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish $1.2 million. On the computer, he types Cornish's name onto a check, then answers his cell phone.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: In an workspace, a attractive, well-maintained gentleman examines his mobile device and responds. On a mobile device, in the dining area, a chubby auburn-haired woman grins and thrusts her hand. Now, in a disordered dwelling, she dries her locks and taps digits into a keypad. Along a reflector, imitation IDs with the auburn-haired woman's picture dangle from a cord. A contraption ejects a debit card with Sandy's designation on it. The auburn-haired woman adds it to a pile of imitation cards and strides off with a resolute demeanor. Now, at a trendy tavern, she arrives wide-eyed and approaches the mixologist. She observes two gentlemen doing shots. She hands him Sandy's debit card. She consumes a shot with the guys. Now, the auburn-haired woman guzzles a bottle of emerald liqueur. She drains it and elevates her limbs. The mixologist adds beverages to her bill, summing over $2,000. Standing on a table, she hurls a bottle. She jumps for the chandelier and lands flat on the ground. The tavern attendees watch her lie immobile. As a few of them extend downward and prod her, she springs up. The exasperated mixologist makes his way over as she high-fives attendees. She punches him in the neck. He collapses. Now, a patrol car arrives at the tavern. Later, two law enforcers escort her out. She exhales into a tube and expels emerald vomit on the law enforcer. As he shakes it off, she turns to the other law enforcer. At the police precinct, the chubby impostor stands in front of a height chart. Now, the actual Sandy sits in front of a birthday pastry, surrounded by his stunning spouse and two young daughters. She gives him a paper necktie. He raises her up. He puts her face in the pastry. She straddles Sandy's lap and gazes at him in the eyes. He draws her close and kisses her gently. She raises her brow. He carries her out of the room. Daytime. Sandy slowly drives down a crowded highway. Later, carrying a briefcase, the well-maintained executive walks through an enclosed courtyard and enters an office edifice. Now, Sandy steps off an elevator and walks to his workspace. A colleague wearing a suit approaches. Sandy puts down a dossier and follows Cornish's aide. He peeks into an office, where Cornish signals him to enter. Cornish gestures to an earphone. He prevents Sandy from sitting. Cornish shuts the door. Now, Sandy inputs a code into a keypad and enters the archives room. He makes his way to a computer station behind a cage wall. He holds up a small packet that lists the collaborators with significant bonuses by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish $1.2 million. On the computer, he types Cornish's name onto a check, then answers his mobile device.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: In an office, a cell phone is checked and answered by a handsome, well-groomed man. On a cell phone, in the food court, a plump redhead smiles and pumps her fist. Now, in a cluttered house, her hair is wiped dry and numbers are punched into a keypad by her. Along a mirror, a string hangs fake IDs with the redhead's photo. A credit card with Sandy's name on it is spat out by a machine. She adds it to a stack of fake cards and walks off with a determined expression. Now, at a hip bar, wide-eyed, she enters and approaches the bartender. Two men doing shots are eyed by her. Sandy's credit card is handed to him by her. A shot is downed with the guys. Now, a bottle of green liqueur is chugged by the redhead. It is finished off by her, and her arms are raised. Drinks are added to her tab by the bartender, totaling over $2,000. Standing on a table, a bottle is thrown by her. She leaps for the chandelier and lands flat on the floor. Her lying motionless is watched by the bar patrons. As she is poked by a few of them reaching down, she springs up. The frustrated bartender makes his way over as she high-fives patrons. A punch is delivered to his throat by her. He collapses. Now, a police car is pulled up to the bar. Later, two officers escort her out. She breathes into a tube and spews green vomit on the officer. As it is shaken off by him, she turns to the other officer. At the police station, a height chart is stood in front of by the plump identity thief. Now, the real Sandy sits in front of a birthday cake, surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters. A paper tie is given to him by her. She is picked up by him. Her face is put into the cake by him. She straddles Sandy's lap and looks him in the eyes. He pulls her close and kisses her tenderly. Her brow is raised by her. She is carried out of the room by him. Daytime. A congested highway is slowly driven down by Sandy. Later, carrying a briefcase, the enclosed courtyard is walked through and an office building is entered by the well-groomed businessman. Now, Sandy steps off an elevator and walks to his office. A co-worker wearing a suit approaches. A file is put down, and Cornish's assistant is followed by Sandy. He peeks into an office, where Cornish beckons him to enter. An earphone is gestured to by Cornish. Sandy is kept from sitting by him. The door is shut by Cornish. Now, a code is input into a keypad, and the records room is entered by Sandy. He makes his way to a computer station behind a cage wall. A small packet is held up by him, which lists the partners with substantial bonuses by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish $1.2 million. Cornish's name is typed onto a check by him on the computer, then he answers his cell phone.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: In an office, a well-groomed man checks his phone and answers. In a food court, a plump redhead smiles and pumps her fist while on a call. At home, she dries her hair and punches numbers into a keypad. Fake IDs with her photo hang near a mirror. A machine produces a credit card labeled Sandy, which she adds to a stack before walking off, determined. At a trendy bar, she enters wide-eyed, eyes two men doing shots, hands the bartender Sandy’s card, and downs a shot. She chugs green liqueur, raises her arms, and the bartender adds over $2,000 to her tab. On a table, she throws a bottle, leaps for a chandelier, and falls. As patrons watch her lie still, she suddenly springs up, high-fives people, and punches the bartender in the throat—he collapses. A police car arrives. Later, officers escort her out. She breathes into a tube and vomits green fluid on one, then turns to the other. At the station, she stands before a height chart. Meanwhile, the real Sandy celebrates a birthday with his wife and two daughters. She gives him a paper tie; he picks her up, playfully pushes her face into the cake, then kisses her. She raises a brow as he carries her out. During the day, Sandy drives on a busy highway. Later, carrying a briefcase, he walks through a courtyard into an office. He steps off an elevator and reaches his office. A suited co-worker approaches. Sandy sets down a file and follows Cornish’s assistant. He peeks in; Cornish beckons him, gestures to an earphone, and prevents him from sitting. Cornish shuts the door. Now, Sandy inputs a code and enters the records room, walking to a computer behind a cage wall. He holds a packet showing partners and bonuses—Harold Cornish: $1.2 million. At the computer, he types Cornish’s name onto a check and answers his phone.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: In an office, a handsome man checks his phone. In a food court, a redhead smiles and pumps her fist. At home, she dries her hair and uses a keypad. Fake IDs with her photo hang by a mirror. A machine produces a credit card with Sandy's name. She adds it to fake cards and leaves determined. At a bar, she approaches the bartender, eyes two men, and uses Sandy's card. She drinks with them, chugs liqueur, and raises her arms. Her tab exceeds $2,000. She throws a bottle, leaps for a chandelier, and falls. Patrons watch her lie motionless. She springs up, high-fives patrons, and punches the bartender. A police car arrives. Officers escort her out. She vomits on an officer. At the station, she stands in front of a height chart. The real Sandy is with his family. He puts his wife's face in a cake, kisses her, and carries her out. Sandy drives on a highway. Later, he enters an office building. Sandy follows Cornish's assistant, peeks into an office, and Cornish gestures to an earphone. Cornish shuts the door. Sandy enters the records room, finds a computer, and lists partners with bonuses. He types Cornish's name on a check and answers his phone.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
In a bustling office environment, a strikingly handsome and impeccably groomed man is seen checking his cell phone with a focused expression before answering it. Meanwhile, in a lively food court, a cheerful and plump redhead, brimming with excitement, smiles broadly and pumps her fist in triumph. Transitioning to a cluttered house, she is now seen drying her hair with a towel while simultaneously punching numbers into a keypad with determination. Alongside a mirror, a string displays several fake IDs, each featuring the redhead's photograph. A machine nearby efficiently spits out a credit card bearing the name Sandy, which she promptly adds to an already substantial stack of counterfeit cards before striding off with a resolute look on her face.

The scene shifts to a trendy and vibrant bar, where the redhead enters with wide-eyed curiosity and approaches the bartender with purpose. Her gaze lands on two men engaged in a lively session of doing shots. With confidence, she hands the bartender the credit card labeled with Sandy's name. She then joins the men, downing a shot with them. In a bold move, the redhead chugs an entire bottle of green liqueur, finishing it off triumphantly and raising her arms in celebration. The bartender, meanwhile, continues to add drinks to her tab, which now totals an astonishing amount exceeding $2,000. In a moment of reckless abandon, she stands on a table and throws a bottle, then leaps for the chandelier, only to land flat on the floor. The bar patrons watch in surprise as she lies motionless, but as a few of them reach down to poke her, she suddenly springs up with energy. The frustrated bartender makes his way over, only to be met with her high-fiving the patrons. In a shocking turn, she punches him in the throat, causing him to collapse.

Outside, a police car arrives at the bar, and later, two officers are seen escorting her out. She is required to breathe into a tube, but instead, she spews green vomit onto one of the officers. As he shakes it off in disgust, she turns her attention to the other officer. At the police station, the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart, her expression unreadable.

Meanwhile, the real Sandy is depicted sitting in front of a birthday cake, surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters, creating a picture of familial bliss. His wife presents him with a paper tie, and in a playful gesture, he picks her up and playfully puts her face into the cake. She straddles Sandy's lap, looking deeply into his eyes, and he pulls her close, kissing her tenderly. She raises her brow in a playful manner, and he carries her out of the room, their bond evident.

In the daytime, Sandy is seen slowly driving down a congested highway, navigating the traffic with patience. Later, carrying a briefcase, the well-groomed businessman walks through an enclosed courtyard and enters an office building with purpose. Sandy steps off an elevator and makes his way to his office, where a co-worker dressed in a suit approaches him. Sandy puts down a file and follows Cornish's assistant, peeking into an office where Cornish beckons him to enter. Cornish gestures to an earphone, preventing Sandy from sitting down. Cornish then shuts the door, creating an air of confidentiality.

Now, Sandy inputs a code into a keypad and enters the records room, making his way to a computer station situated behind a cage wall. He holds up a small packet that lists the partners, each with substantial bonuses next to their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish with a staggering $1.2 million. On the computer, Sandy types Cornish's name onto a check, then answers his cell phone, his expression unreadable.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
In a bustling and lively office environment filled with activity, a strikingly handsome man with impeccable grooming is observed checking his cell phone. With a focused and attentive expression on his face, he answers the call. Meanwhile, in a lively and energetic food court, a cheerful and plump redhead radiates excitement. She smiles broadly, her eyes sparkling with joy, and pumps her fist in triumph, her enthusiasm clearly visible. The scene transitions smoothly to a cluttered and somewhat chaotic house, where she is seen vigorously drying her hair with a towel. Simultaneously, with a look of determination, she punches numbers into a keypad. Displayed alongside a mirror is a string holding several fake IDs, each featuring her photograph. Nearby, a machine efficiently produces a credit card with the name Sandy, which she promptly adds to an already substantial stack of counterfeit cards, clutching them resolutely before striding off.

The scene shifts to a trendy and vibrant bar, buzzing with energy, where the redhead enters with wide-eyed curiosity that captures the lively atmosphere. With a sense of purpose, she approaches the bartender, her gaze landing on two men immersed in a spirited session of doing shots. Exhibiting confidence, she hands the bartender the credit card labeled with Sandy's name and then joins the men, enthusiastically downing a shot with them. In a bold and audacious move, the redhead chugs an entire bottle of green liqueur, finishing it off with a triumphant flourish and raising her arms high in celebration. Meanwhile, the bartender continues dutifully to add drinks to her tab, which now totals an astonishing and jaw-dropping amount exceeding $2,000. In a moment of reckless abandon, she climbs onto a table and throws a bottle, then leaps for the chandelier, ultimately landing flat on the floor. The bar patrons watch in disbelief and surprise as she lies motionless. However, as a few reach down to nudge her, she suddenly springs up with renewed energy. The frustrated bartender makes his way over, only to be met with her high-fiving the nearby patrons. In an unexpected and shocking turn, she punches him in the throat, causing him to collapse dramatically.

Outside the bar, the arrival of a police car signals trouble, and later, two officers escort her out. She is required to breathe into a tube, but instead, she shockingly spews green vomit onto one of the officers. As he attempts to shake it off in disgust, she redirects her attention to the other officer. At the police station, the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart, her expression remaining unreadable and enigmatic.

Meanwhile, the real Sandy is depicted as seated contentedly in front of a birthday cake, surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters, creating a heartwarming picture of familial bliss. His wife presents him with a paper tie, and in a playful and affectionate gesture, he picks her up, playfully putting her face into the cake. She straddles Sandy's lap, gazing deeply into his eyes, and he pulls her close, kissing her tenderly. She raises her brow in a playful, teasing manner, and he carries her out of the room, their loving bond joyfully evident.

During the daytime, Sandy is seen in his car, slowly navigating the congested highway with patience and composure amidst the traffic. Later, carrying a briefcase with purpose, the well-groomed businessman walks through an enclosed courtyard, making his way into an office building. Sandy steps off the elevator and proceeds to his office, where a co-worker, smartly dressed in a suit, approaches him. Sandy places a file down and follows Cornish's assistant, peeking into an office where Cornish gestures for him to enter. Cornish points to an earphone, subtly indicating that Sandy should not sit down. Cornish then shuts the door, creating an atmosphere of confidentiality and secrecy.

Now, Sandy carefully inputs a code into a keypad and enters the records room. He makes his way to a computer station situated securely behind a cage wall. Holding up a small packet, he examines a list of partners, each with substantial bonuses adjacent to their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish, accompanied by a staggering $1.2 million. On the computer screen, Sandy types Cornish's name onto a check. Shortly thereafter, he answers his cell phone, his expression remaining unreadable and enigmatic.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: In an office, a handsome, well-groomed man glances at his cell phone, noticing an incoming call, and promptly answers it, bringing the device to his ear. Meanwhile, in a bustling food court, a plump redhead, filled with excitement, checks her own cell phone, breaks into a broad smile, and pumps her fist in triumph. Transitioning to a cluttered house, she emerges from a room, her hair damp, and vigorously wipes it dry with a towel. She then moves to a nearby keypad, her fingers deftly punching in numbers. Alongside a mirror, a string displays several fake IDs, each featuring the redhead's photo, swaying slightly as she passes. A machine nearby whirs to life, spitting out a freshly minted credit card bearing the name Sandy. With a practiced hand, she adds this new card to an already substantial stack of fake cards, her expression set with determination as she strides purposefully out of the room. Now, at a trendy bar, she enters with wide eyes, taking in the lively atmosphere, and makes her way to the bartender, her gaze briefly settling on two men engaged in a shot-drinking contest. She confidently hands the bartender the credit card labeled Sandy, then joins the men, downing a shot with them in camaraderie. Her boldness escalates as she grabs a bottle of green liqueur, chugging it with abandon until it's empty, and triumphantly raises her arms in victory. The bartender, meanwhile, continues to add drinks to her tab, which quickly accumulates to over $2,000. In a moment of reckless exuberance, she climbs onto a table, hurls a bottle across the room, and leaps for the chandelier, only to miss and land flat on the floor. The bar patrons, initially shocked, watch her lie motionless, but as a few reach down to poke her, she suddenly springs up, much to their surprise. The bartender, now visibly frustrated, makes his way over, but she greets him with a high-five to the patrons before abruptly punching him in the throat, causing him to collapse. Outside, a police car pulls up to the bar, and later, two officers escort her out, guiding her to their vehicle. She is instructed to breathe into a tube, but instead, she spews green vomit onto one of the officers, who recoils and shakes it off in disgust. She then turns her attention to the other officer. At the police station, the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart, her demeanor now subdued. Meanwhile, the real Sandy is at home, seated in front of a birthday cake, surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters. His wife presents him with a paper tie, which he accepts with a smile, then playfully picks her up and gently places her face into the cake, eliciting laughter. She straddles Sandy's lap, gazing into his eyes with affection, and he responds by pulling her close for a tender kiss. She raises her brow in a playful gesture, and he carries her out of the room, their bond evident. In the daytime, Sandy is seen driving slowly down a congested highway, navigating the traffic with patience. Later, carrying a briefcase, the well-groomed businessman walks through an enclosed courtyard, his steps measured and confident, and enters an office building. Now, Sandy steps off an elevator, his destination clear, and walks to his office, where a co-worker in a suit approaches him. Sandy sets down a file, acknowledging the co-worker, and follows Cornish's assistant, who leads him to an office where Cornish is waiting. Cornish gestures for Sandy to enter, indicating an earphone as a point of interest, and prevents Sandy from sitting, instead shutting the door to ensure privacy. Now, Sandy inputs a code into a keypad, gaining access to the records room, and makes his way to a computer station situated behind a cage wall. He holds up a small packet, examining the list of partners with substantial bonuses noted beside their names, his eyes lingering on the bottom name: Harold Cornish, $1.2 million. With a decisive keystroke, he types Cornish's name onto a check on the computer, then pauses as his cell phone rings, prompting him to answer it.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
In an office, a well-groomed man checks his cell phone and answers a call. Meanwhile, in a food court, a plump redhead celebrates with a fist pump. Later, at her cluttered house, she dries her hair, inputs numbers into a keypad, and adds a newly printed credit card with her photo to a stack of fake IDs. With determination, she heads to a hip bar, where she uses the fake card to buy drinks, joining two men for shots and chugging a bottle of green liqueur. As her tab exceeds $2,000, she creates a scene by throwing a bottle, attempting to swing from a chandelier, and landing on the floor. After lying motionless, she springs up, high-fives patrons, and punches the approaching bartender in the throat, causing him to collapse. A police car arrives, and officers escort her out. At the station, she stands in front of a height chart after vomiting on an officer during a breathalyzer test.

Meanwhile, the real Sandy enjoys a birthday celebration with his family, receiving a paper tie from his wife, playfully putting her face in the cake, and sharing a tender moment before carrying her out of the room. Later, Sandy drives down a congested highway, then enters an office building with a briefcase. He steps off an elevator, heads to his office, and is approached by a suited co-worker. Following Cornish's assistant, he peeks into an office where Cornish gestures for him to enter, preventing him from sitting and shutting the door. Sandy then inputs a code to access the records room, where he examines a list of partners with substantial bonuses, noting Harold Cornish's $1.2 million. He types Cornish's name onto a check and answers his cell phone.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: In a bustling downtown office, a handsome, well-groomed man checks his cell phone and answers, likely reviewing messages related to his position at a financial firm. Meanwhile, in the food court of a large shopping mall, a plump redhead smiles and pumps her fist, signaling a successful act of deception. Now, in a cluttered house filled with old newspapers and discarded clothing, she wipes her hair dry and punches numbers into a keypad, likely preparing another fraudulent transaction. Along a mirror, fake IDs with the redhead's photo, used in various cons around the city, hang from a string. A sophisticated machine spits out a credit card with Sandy's name on it, leveraging stolen personal details. The redhead, an experienced identity thief, adds it to a stack of fake cards and walks off with a determined expression. Now, at a hip downtown bar known for its vibrant nightlife, she enters wide-eyed and approaches the bartender, seeking her next mark. She eyes two men doing shots, possibly targeting them for further scams. She hands him Sandy's credit card, confident in her deceit. She downs a shot with the guys, embracing the wild atmosphere. Now, the redhead chugs a bottle of expensive green liqueur, possibly absinthe, known for its high alcohol content. She finishes it off and raises her arms in a bold display. The bartender adds drinks to her tab, totaling over $2,000, an exorbitant amount suggesting a night of excess. Standing on a table, she boldly throws a bottle across the room. She leaps for the chandelier, a risky stunt, and lands flat on the floor. The bar patrons watch her lie motionless, unsure if it's part of her act. As a few of them reach down and poke her, she suddenly springs up, much to their surprise. The frustrated bartender makes his way over as she high-fives patrons in a show of bravado. She unexpectedly punches him in the throat, a sudden act of violence. He collapses, clutching his throat in pain. Now, a police car pulls up to the bar, responding to the disturbance. Later, two officers escort her out, ending her night of revelry. She breathes into a tube, part of a standard sobriety test, and spews green vomit on the officer, a consequence of her overindulgence. As he shakes it off, she turns to the other officer with a defiant look. At the police station, the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart, her criminal activities catching up with her. Now, the real Sandy, an unsuspecting victim, sits in front of a birthday cake surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters, enjoying a moment of family happiness. She gives him a paper tie, a homemade gift symbolizing love and appreciation. He playfully picks her up, showing his affection. He puts her face in the cake, a humorous, lighthearted gesture. She straddles Sandy's lap and looks him in the eyes, sharing a tender family moment. He pulls her close and kisses her tenderly, deepening their bond. She raises her brow, indicating playful surprise. He carries her out of the room, ending their celebration. Daytime. Sandy slowly drives down a congested highway, likely heading to work amid the morning rush. Later, carrying a briefcase filled with important documents, the well-groomed businessman walks through an enclosed courtyard and enters a gleaming office building. Now, Sandy steps off an elevator and walks to his office, ready for another day of work. A co-worker wearing a suit, possibly a junior associate, approaches with some urgency. Sandy puts down a file and follows Cornish's assistant, who leads him to a meeting. He peeks into an office, where Cornish, an influential figure in the company, beckons him to enter. Cornish gestures to an earphone, suggesting a confidential conversation. He keeps Sandy from sitting, hinting at the urgency of their interaction. Cornish shuts the door, ensuring privacy. Now, Sandy inputs a code into a keypad and enters the records room, where sensitive information is stored. He makes his way to a computer station behind a cage wall, indicating high security. He holds up a small packet that lists the partners with substantial bonuses by their names, highlighting company profits. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish $1.2 million, a significant figure reflecting his high status. On the computer, he types Cornish's name onto a check, then answers his cell phone, possibly receiving an important call.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: In an office a handsome wellgroomed man checks his cell phone and answers. On a cell phone in the food court a plump redhead smiles and pumps her fist. Now in a cluttered house she wipes her hair dry and punches numbers into a keypad. Along a mirror fake IDs with the redhead's photo hang from a string. A machine spits out a credit card with Sandy's name on it. The redhead adds it to a stack of fake cards and walks off with a determined expression. Now at a hip bar she enters wideeyed and approaches the bartender. She eyes two men doing shots. She hands him Sandy's credit card. She downs a shot with the guys. Now the redhead chugs a bottle of green liqueur. She finishes it off and raises her arms. The bartender adds drinks to her tab totaling over 2000. Standing on a table she throws a bottle. She leaps for the chandelier and lands flat on the floor. The bar patrons watch her lie motionless. As a few of them reach down and poke her she springs up. The frustrated bartender makes his way over as she highfives patrons. She punches him in the throat. He collapses. Now a police car pulls up to the bar. Later two officers escort her out. She breathes into a tube and spews green vomit on the officer. As he shakes it off she turns to the other officer. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. At the police station the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart. Now the real Sandy sits in front of a birthday cake surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters. She gives him a paper tie. He picks her up. He puts her face in the cake. She straddles Sandy's lap and looks him in the eyes. He pulls her close and kisses her tenderly. She raises her brow. He carries her out of the room. Daytime. Sandy slowly drives down a congested highway. Later carrying a briefcase the wellgroomed businessman walks through an enclosed courtyard and enters an office building. Now Sandy steps off an elevator and walks to his office. A coworker wearing a suit approaches. Sandy puts down a file and follows Cornish's assistant. He peeks into an office where Cornish beckons him to enter. Cornish gestures to an earphone. He keeps Sandy from sitting. Cornish shuts the door. Now Sandy inputs a code into a keypad and enters the records room. He makes his way to a computer station behind a cage wall. He holds up a small packet that lists the partners with substantial bonuses by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish 12 million. On the computer he types Cornish's name onto a check then answers his cell phone.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: In an office, a small dog checks its cell phone and answers. On a cell phone, in the food court, a giraffe smiles and pumps its fist. Now, in a cluttered house, it wipes its hair dry and punches numbers into a keypad. Along a mirror, fake IDs with the giraffe's photo hang from a string. A machine spits out a credit card with Sandy's name on it. The giraffe adds it to a stack of fake cards and walks off with a determined expression. Now, at a hip bar, it enters wide-eyed and approaches the bartender. It eyes two men doing shots. It hands him Sandy's credit card. It downs a shot with the guys. Now, the giraffe chugs a bottle of green liqueur. It finishes it off and raises its arms. The bartender adds drinks to its tab, totaling over $2,000. Standing on a table, it throws a bottle. It leaps for the chandelier and lands flat on the floor. The bar patrons watch it lie motionless. As a few of them reach down and poke it, it springs up. The frustrated bartender makes his way over as it high-fives patrons. It punches him in the throat. He collapses. Now, a police car pulls up to the bar. Later, two officers escort it out. It breathes into a tube and spews green vomit on the officer. As he shakes it off, it turns to the other officer. At the police station, the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart. Now, the real Sandy sits in front of a birthday cake, surrounded by a clever fox and two young kittens. It gives him a paper tie. He picks it up. He puts its face in the cake. It straddles Sandy's lap and looks him in the eyes. He pulls it close and kisses it tenderly. It raises its brow. He carries it out of the room. Daytime. Sandy slowly drives down a congested highway. Later, carrying a briefcase, a penguin walks through an enclosed courtyard and enters an office building. Now, Sandy steps off an elevator and walks to its office. A co-worker wearing a suit approaches. Sandy puts down a file and follows a bear's assistant. It peeks into an office, where the bear beckons it to enter. The bear gestures to an earphone. It keeps Sandy from sitting. The bear shuts the door. Now, Sandy inputs a code into a keypad and enters the records room. It makes its way to a computer station behind a cage wall. It holds up a small packet that lists the partners with substantial bonuses by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Bear $1.2 million. On the computer, it types the bear's name onto a check, then answers its cell phone.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: In a greenhouse, a handsome, well-groomed man checks his tablet and answers. On a tablet, in the art gallery, a plump redhead smiles and pumps her fist. Now, in a cluttered attic, she wipes her hair dry and punches numbers into a remote. Along a bookshelf, fake passports with the redhead's photo hang from a thread. A device spits out a debit card with Sandy's name on it. The redhead adds it to a stack of fake cards and walks off with a determined expression. Now, at a trendy cafe, she enters wide-eyed and approaches the barista. She eyes two women sipping espressos. She hands him Sandy's debit card. She downs an espresso with the women. Now, the redhead chugs a bottle of mineral water. She finishes it off and raises her arms. The barista adds pastries to her bill, totaling over $2,000. Standing on a chair, she throws a cup. She leaps for the ceiling fan and lands flat on the floor. The cafe patrons watch her lie motionless. As a few of them reach down and poke her, she springs up. The frustrated barista makes his way over as she high-fives patrons. She punches him in the chest. He collapses. Now, a fire truck pulls up to the cafe. Later, two firefighters escort her out. She breathes into a device and spews green paint on the firefighter. As he shakes it off, she turns to the other firefighter. At the community center, the plump impersonator stands in front of a mural. Now, the real Sandy sits in front of a stack of pancakes, surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters. She gives him a paper crown. He picks her up. He puts her face in the pancakes. She straddles Sandy's lap and looks him in the eyes. He pulls her close and kisses her tenderly. She raises her brow. He carries her out of the room. Daytime. Sandy slowly drives down a crowded street. Later, carrying a backpack, the well-groomed entrepreneur walks through a botanical garden and enters a conference center. Now, Sandy steps off an escalator and walks to his cubicle. A co-worker wearing a blazer approaches. Sandy puts down a portfolio and follows Cornish's executive assistant. He peeks into a boardroom, where Cornish beckons him to enter. Cornish gestures to a headset. He keeps Sandy from sitting. Cornish shuts the door. Now, Sandy inputs a code into a remote and enters the archives area. He makes his way to a computer station behind a glass partition. He holds up a small envelope that lists the associates with substantial bonuses by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish $1.2 million. On the computer, he types Cornish's name onto a voucher, then answers his tablet.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: In an office, a handsome, well-groomed man scrolls through his cell phone and laughs. On a cell phone, in the food court, a plump redhead frowns and stomps her foot. Now, in a cluttered house, she shakes her hair dry and scribbles numbers onto a piece of paper. Along a mirror, fake IDs with the redhead's photo are taped to a string. A machine tosses out a credit card with Sandy's name on it. The redhead flips it onto a stack of fake cards and skips off with a determined expression. Now, at a hip bar, she sneaks in wide-eyed and signals the bartender. She glances at two men playing darts. She waves Sandy's credit card. She sips a shot with the guys. Now, the redhead gulps a bottle of green liqueur. She tosses it aside and crosses her arms. The bartender adds drinks to her tab, totaling over $2,000. Standing on a table, she twirls a bottle. She swings for the chandelier and rolls onto the floor. The bar patrons watch her lie still. As a few of them glance over and prod her, she bounces up. The frustrated bartender strides over as she fist-bumps patrons. She shoves him in the chest. He stumbles. Now, a police car screeches up to the bar. Later, two officers lead her out. She blows into a tube and spits green vomit on the officer. As he wipes it off, she winks at the other officer. At the police station, the plump identity thief stands in front of a height chart. Now, the real Sandy sits in front of a birthday cake, surrounded by his beautiful wife and two young daughters. She passes him a paper tie. He spins her around. He plants her face in the cake. She lounges across Sandy's lap and stares him in the eyes. He nudges her closer and kisses her softly. She furrows her brow. He sweeps her out of the room. Daytime. Sandy quickly maneuvers down a congested highway. Later, holding a briefcase, the well-groomed businessman strolls through an enclosed courtyard and exits an office building. Now, Sandy steps off an elevator and rushes to his office. A co-worker wearing a suit gestures. Sandy tosses down a file and trails behind Cornish's assistant. He peers into an office, where Cornish waves him to enter. Cornish points to an earphone. He prevents Sandy from leaving. Cornish swings the door shut. Now, Sandy scribbles a code into a keypad and accesses the records room. He sneaks his way to a computer station behind a cage wall. He shows off a small packet that lists the partners with impressive bonuses by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish $1.2 million. On the computer, he writes Cornish's name onto a check, then chuckles into his cell phone.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: In a library, an adventurous, scruffy teenager checks his wristwatch and answers. On a wristwatch, in the swimming pool, an energetic brunette giggles and waves her hat. Now, in a tidy garage, he dries his shoes and punches letters into a remote. Beneath a bookshelf, fake badges with the brunette's image dangle from a ribbon. A printer spits out a membership card with Alex's name on it. The brunette adds it to a pile of fake coins and skips off with a thoughtful expression. Now, at a rustic café, she enters bright-eyed and approaches the cashier. She eyes three women sipping smoothies. She hands him Alex's membership card. She gulps a smoothie with the ladies. Now, the brunette guzzles a mug of orange soda. She finishes it off and raises her legs. The cashier adds sandwiches to her tab, totaling over $3,000. Standing on a bench, she tosses a napkin. She leaps for the ceiling fan and lands flat on the carpet. The café patrons watch her lie motionless. As a few of them reach down and nudge her, she jumps up. The annoyed cashier makes his way over as she fist-bumps patrons. She kicks him in the chin. He topples. Now, a fire truck pulls up to the café. Later, two firefighters escort her out. She breathes into a mask and splashes orange paint on the firefighter. As he brushes it off, she turns to the other firefighter. At the fire station, the energetic impersonator stands in front of a lineup chart. Now, the real Alex sits in front of a graduation diploma, surrounded by his loyal dog and three clever parrots. He gives it a wooden bowl. It picks him up. It puts his hand in the diploma. He climbs Alex's shoulder and looks him in the eyes. He pulls it close and whispers softly. It raises its wings. He carries it out of the yard. Midnight. Alex swiftly cycles down an empty street. Later, carrying a backpack, the scruffy engineer walks through a crowded park and enters a community center. Now, Alex steps off a bench and walks to his workshop. A friend wearing a hat approaches. Alex puts down a notebook and follows Taylor's advisor. He peeks into a library, where Taylor invites him to enter. Taylor gestures to a laptop. He keeps Alex from standing. Taylor shuts the window. Now, Alex inputs a design into a remote and enters the server room. He makes his way to a console station behind a glass panel. He holds up a small envelope that lists the clients with substantial orders by their surnames. The top surname reads Leslie Taylor $2.5 billion. On the monitor, he types Taylor's surname onto a voucher, then answers his wristwatch.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: In a library, a confident, disheveled woman inspects her smartwatch and declines. On a tablet, in the atrium, a tall blonde frowns and claps her hands. Now, in a neat apartment, she combs her hair gently and types letters into a laptop. Along a bulletin board, event flyers with the blonde's image are pinned with a clip. A printer ejects a business card with Alice's name on it. The blonde places it onto a collection of expired coupons and skips away with a carefree grin. Now, at a bustling gym, she arrives wide-eyed and greets the trainer. She studies two women lifting weights. She offers him Alice's business card. She lifts a dumbbell with the ladies. Now, the blonde gulps a bottle of protein shake. She finishes it off and claps. The trainer adds exercises to her routine, totaling over 2,000 reps. Standing on a treadmill, she tosses a towel. She swings for the pull-up bar and lands gracefully on the mat. The gym-goers observe her sit motionless. As a few of them come over and nudge her, she bursts up. The exasperated trainer heads towards her as she fist-bumps attendees. She tickles him in the ribs. He collapses. Now, a fire engine arrives at the gym. Later, two firefighters walk her out. She giggles into a megaphone and sprays green paint on the firefighter. As he brushes it off, she nods at the other firefighter. At the fire station, the tall impersonator stands in front of a notice board. Now, the true Alice stands in front of a wedding cake, surrounded by his handsome husband and two teenage sons. He gives her a silk scarf. She lifts him up. He pushes her face into the cake. She perches on Alice's lap and gazes into his eyes. She draws him close and kisses him tenderly. He tilts his head. She wheels him out of the room. Daytime. Alice quickly speeds down a bustling avenue. Later, clutching a briefcase, the disheveled architect strides through an open plaza and exits a library. Now, Alice steps onto a train and strolls to his compartment. A colleague donning a uniform approaches. Alice drops a notebook and follows Clarke's representative. He peers into a compartment, where Clarke waves him to enter. Clarke nods to a headphone. He blocks Alice from reclining. Clarke locks the window. Now, Alice inputs a password into a keyboard and accesses the conference room. He navigates to a workstation behind a glass panel. He waves a small envelope that lists the donors with generous contributions by their names. The top name reads Esther Clarke $1.2 million. On the computer, he enters Clarke's name into a spreadsheet, then declines a call on his smartwatch.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: In a library, a handsome, well-groomed man glances at his tablet and responds. On a tablet, in the arcade, a plump redhead laughs and claps her hands. Now, in a tidy apartment, she combs her hair and taps buttons on a calculator. Beside a clock, fake tickets with the redhead's photo dangle from a wire. A printer ejects a boarding pass with Sandy's name on it. The redhead adds it to a stack of counterfeit passes and skips off with a triumphant expression. Now, at a trendy café, she enters starry-eyed and greets the barista. She observes two men playing chess. She hands him Sandy's boarding pass. She eats a pastry with the players. Now, the redhead sips a glass of orange soda. She empties it and waves her arms. The barista piles desserts onto her tab, adding up to over $2,000. Standing on a chair, she tosses a plate. She jumps for the ceiling fan and lands face-first on the floor. The café patrons watch her lie motionless. As a few of them prod her with rolled-up newspapers, she jumps up. The annoyed barista makes his way over as she high-fives patrons. She elbows him in the side. He tumbles. Now, a fire truck pulls up to the café. Later, two firefighters escort her out. She breathes into a mask and spews orange juice on the firefighter. As he brushes it off, she turns to the other firefighter. At the fire station, the plump impersonator stands in front of a growth chart. Now, the real Sandy sits in front of a holiday pie, surrounded by his elegant wife and two young sons. She hands him a hand-painted mug. He lifts her up. He smudges her face with pie. She perches on Sandy's lap and gazes into his eyes. He draws her close and kisses her softly. She arches her brow. He carries her out of the room. Daytime. Sandy gradually pedals down a bustling boulevard. Later, holding a laptop bag, the well-groomed businessman strolls through an open plaza and enters a shopping mall. Now, Sandy steps off a staircase and marches to his cabin. A colleague wearing a blazer approaches. Sandy puts down a folder and follows Cornish's aide. He glances into a room, where Cornish gestures for him to come in. Cornish points to a microphone. He prevents Sandy from standing. Cornish locks the entrance. Now, Sandy pushes a button on a remote and enters the archives area. He makes his way to a kiosk behind a glass partition. He holds up a small envelope that lists the investors with considerable earnings by their names. The bottom name reads Harold Cornish $1.2 million. On the computer, he enters Cornish's name onto an invoice, then glances at his tablet.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: In a garden, a colorful, feathered parrot examines its wristwatch and whistles. On a wristwatch, in the bike shop, a lanky brunette laughs and waves her flag. Now, in a spacious barn, she combs her tail and scribbles letters onto a notepad. Along a fence, concert tickets with the brunette's picture dangle from a ribbon. A printer ejects a library card with Alex's title on it. The brunette places it with a tower of forged documents and strolls away with a playful grin. Now, in a bustling cafe, she strides starry-eyed and greets the chef. She scans three women sipping cappuccinos. She offers him Alex's library card. She gulps a mocha with the ladies. Now, the brunette sips a cup of blue tea. She empties it and claps her hands. The chef tacks snacks onto her bill, amounting to over $3,000. Standing on a chair, she tosses a cup. She swings for the pendant lamp and lands awkwardly on the carpet. The cafe customers observe her remain still. As several of them lean down and prod her, she jumps up. The annoyed chef strides over as she fist-bumps guests. She slaps him on the shoulder. He crouches. Now, a fire engine arrives at the cafe. Later, two firefighters accompany her out. She huffs into a balloon and sprays blue confetti on the firefighter. As he brushes it off, she spins to the other firefighter. At the firehouse, the lanky trickster poses in front of a bulletin board. Now, the true Alex relaxes in front of a holiday pudding, encircled by his charming husband and twin sons. He hands him a paper crown. She lifts him up. She dips his head in the pudding. He perches on Alex's chair and gazes into his eyes. She pulls him near and pecks him gently. He arches his back. She escorts him out of the barn. Morning. Alex casually bikes down a crowded alley. Later, clutching a backpack, the feathered executive glides through an open terrace and exits a factory. Now, Alex descends an escalator and cycles to his cubicle. A clerk wearing a tie greets him. Alex sets down a binder and trails Crane’s aide. He glances into a cubicle, where Crane gestures for him to approach. Crane points to a microphone. She prevents Alex from perching. Crane locks the window. Now, Alex inputs a passphrase into a calculator and accesses the archive vault. He ambles to a typewriter kiosk beneath a netted ceiling. She waves a tiny booklet that lists the investors with massive profits by their handles. The final entry reads Leonard Crane $2.5 billion. On the tablet, he inscribes Crane’s handle onto a voucher, then rings his wristwatch.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: In an office, a handsome man checks his phone. Meanwhile, a plump redhead in a food court smiles and pumps her fist. At home, she creates fake IDs and credit cards, adding them to a stack before heading to a bar. Using a fake card under the name Sandy, she racks up a $2,000 tab, drinks heavily, and causes a scene. She punches the bartender and, as police arrive, vomits on an officer. At the station, she's in front of a height chart. Meanwhile, the real Sandy enjoys a birthday with his family. Later, he navigates traffic and enters an office building with his briefcase. Sandy follows a co-worker to an office, where Cornish gestures him in. In the records room, Sandy finds a list of partners with bonuses, including Cornish's substantial $1.2 million. He types Cornish's name onto a check and answers his phone.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: On the computer he types Cornish's name onto a check then answers his cell phone The bottom name reads Harold Cornish 12 million  He holds up a small packet that lists the partners with substantial bonuses by their names  He makes his way to a computer station behind a cage wall  Now Sandy inputs a code into a keypad and enters the records room  Cornish shuts the door  He keeps Sandy from sitting  Cornish gestures to an earphone  He peeks into an office where Cornish beckons him to enter  Sandy puts down a file and follows Cornish's assistant  A coworker wearing a suit approaches  Now Sandy steps off an elevator and walks to his office  Later carrying a briefcase the wellgroomed businessman walks through an enclosed courtyard and enters an office building  Sandy slowly drives down a congested highway  Daytime  He carries her out of the room  She raises her brow  He pulls her close and kisses her tenderly  She straddles Sandy's lap and looks him in the phone in the food court a plump redhead smiles and pumps her fist  In an office a handsome wellgroomed man checks his cell phone and answers
